## Install

### 1. Reset to factory settings

`%%SpecCode93`

![%%SpecCode93](data:image/png;base64,)

### 2. Connect via Bluetooth HID

If the device has already been paired, please reset it before via step 1.

Press the button until beep & light blinking, it's now in pairing mode.

Connect the bluetooth device on your desktop, it will appear as a keyboard device called `BarCode ScannerHID`.

Your scanner should be working now, open notepad for example and focus the edition area, scan a barcode or qr code and it should be automatically typed.

## Customize

### 1. De-activate startup sound

`^#SC^30300D0`

![^#SC^30300D0](data:image/png;base64,)

### 2. De-activate read sound

`%%SpecCode94`

![%%SpecCode94](data:image/png;base64,)

### 3. Set sleep time to 30 sec

`%%SpecCode30`

![%%SpecCode30](data:image/png;base64,)

### 4. Set keyboard to FR

`%%SpecCode42`

![%%SpecCode42](data:image/png;base64,)

For example, this QR code should display the name of a greatly talented open source guy :

![^^](data:image/png;base64,)
